website_summaries.verdict: We didn’t find the Executioner to be that much better than the Bearclaw or ITP, each of which offer more traction, durability, and a better ride.
pros: This is a tire for lighter-duty applications, and it is meant to be used on smoother surfaces
cons: It offers enough grip to get you in trouble but seemingly not enough to extract you out of it

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty tire!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 27x10-12 all around and they came shipped perfect, all same size and they are awesome!. They do vibrate under 5 MPH but nothing you can’t handle for the lugs they are..Very thick tire so it’s tough to mount without a machine. I have no complaints. This is them on my sportsman 570. (I did have to buy offset wheels to fit them)
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: buy em'
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires. I got 27x10x12 fronts and 27x12x12 in the rear on my 02 foreman 450es with 2in lift. Great prices and they look great with the large agressive lugs. I didn't realize how big these tires where gonna be. They make my quad look great. I wanted a good mud tire without going over the top and these are just what I needed. Another thing to add is these tires also have a deep bead with rim guard so basically they stick about a 1/4 past the rim to protect it from scratches. Would recommend to anyone and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: 25x10x12 tires are performing great on my garden tractor in slick muddy conditions. However they measure like a 24" tire! Wish I would have ordered 26s or 27s.
customer_reviews.author: SBCG

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for his 4-wheeler. They look very aggressive, but it’s what he wants! No problem with order, shipping or delivery. Tires looked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Should be great in sand or snow
customer_reviews.text: 25x10x12 on 12” x 7.5” wide rims. Should be even better in the snow than the SunF all terrain tires i had. The all terrains would clog up with snow turning them into slicks. All terrains got me up to cabin but a little iffy. These should be awesome in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very good/nice tire for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great strong 6ply tire with tremendous grip. Used it on a garden tractor with an inner tube. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Istvan Varga

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: 2 inches larger in height and width from factory and fitment was perfect. No rubbing. Look great and dig awesome. Haven't gotten stuck yet
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Huggins

customer_reviews.title: GET THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tires, they have put me through everything that I couldn’t go through before, only thing I don’t like is the wearing, I had bad wheel bearings in all four tires and the front tires seemed to wear really quick until I put the new bearings in, other than that, I absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.text: Wear like iron, heavy but thick, deep lugs. Seem to walk through anything. Great bead guards.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Try them out
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice tires going try them out for the winter and see how it’s goes...
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Usugan

customer_reviews.title: 08 750vtwin brute force
customer_reviews.text: i bought these tires and have put about 200miles on them so far and i am still satisfied, the ride isnt very smooth because of the design. but if you are buying a tires with a paddle\tractor tire design like this you can not expect a smooth ride. does good in the mud\water and trails. if you ride on hard packed surfaces or pavement, i would not get this tire. because it would be very bumpy. if you love the mud and trails and woods and everything sloppy. then well worth the money. also they have a bead protector on them to. thought that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Krizanek

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on the rims.. They give alot of traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are not that bad on dry pavement either
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a difference from stock tires. I pull a brush hog with my ATV and had a hard time slipping up hill when the grass was a little wet. NOT NO MORE ...WOW Don't even have to use 4X4. They are not that bad on dry pavement either. Should of got these a LONG time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jadlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Dollar Aggressive mud tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for a darn good price! Handles mud and snow great! On side angles in slick mud, you will slide sideways so side grip isn’t perfect but that’s common with such aggressively treaded tires. Great tire though!
customer_reviews.author: Jayden Korthals

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid level tire
customer_reviews.text: They are not as expensive as the muzillas but does the job. I don't spin as much in the swamp as I use too with the stock tires. They are bumpy at lower speeds but that is expected. All in all I say if you want an inexpensive mud tire then you won't be disappointed. These are also very tough tires. I'm running through some tough woods and these tires just take it. Be careful on Polaris 400 H.O. The front tires are close to rubbing my tie rod ends. I bought the exact specs for my stock rims. I'm am really please with the look and the pull of these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Holloman

customer_reviews.title: Tire review
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a environment that is wet and muddy, not so good on the payment they vibrate, but that's to be expected. I'm on my second set. I had these on my older arcticcats also
customer_reviews.author: Randy Watt

customer_reviews.title: Best mud tire for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I've seen lots of atv tires. I currently have 3 different sets of mud tires on each bike Itp XTR's and Mega Mayhem's. All great tires but when it comes to the price. Kenda Executioners hands down are a great buy. They are not Outlaws or Silverbacks, but on the right bike they can be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Joey P

customer_reviews.title: Must have these tires
customer_reviews.text: Best tires ever, don't need 4 wheel drive when you got these baby's, traction is so good no more spin outs!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm very surprised about how well these perform....especially for the price! I've had much more expensive tires on my ATVs in the past but these are just as good if not better than the others. I highly recommend these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: if they function half as well as they look, ...
customer_reviews.text: if they function half as well as they look, it will be boss. I wouldn't get them unless you plan to trailer your rig.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: mud slingers
customer_reviews.text: these will get you in some trouble (if you get stuck) very aggressive will handle anything in your way these are awsome not so good on hard ground they dont ride smooth
customer_reviews.author: Eric Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great. Grip is excellent. Installed on a Honda Rubicon, wish I had done this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sawmiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best all around tire for a ranger 6x6 in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. Just what I wanted for my four wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ledet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wicked traction nothing slows these down great traction in snow and mud
customer_reviews.author: Eric Phillips

customer_reviews.title: so far I love them however other reviews stating they ride rough on ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires are very agressive, so far I love them however other reviews stating they ride rough on hard surfaces are spot on, and they do tear up the yard a little on soft ground, but I bought them for maximum traction, and they sure have plant of that!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great for mudding!
customer_reviews.text: These tires pull awesome in mud. They have better grip than other comparable tires I have bought. However they do not grip very well on roots or logs. Yet the deeper the mud the better they pull.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Nobles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Very cheap when compared with tires from store. Very good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mario B.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Good tires, heavy duty. They have a good bite in the mud but not too much to where they will damage drive train.
customer_reviews.author: cameron webb

customer_reviews.title: Good tires.
customer_reviews.text: I put these bad boys on my Grizzly 700. So far did great in the snow and mud. They still look new after 500 miles.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: great off road tire
customer_reviews.text: these tires look great and handle well on rough terrain however do not ride well on pavement we installed them on our golf cart between the new tires and rims the cart looks sharp
customer_reviews.author: mickeymalo9

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: They ride a little rough but the first time you bury your quad in a mud hole you will learn to love these tires. My 2010 Suzuki King Quad 750 is unstoppable with these amazing tires.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Unstopable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for a little diesel pulling tractor I built for pulling logs. Diesel+gearing+these tires= one hell of a log puller.
customer_reviews.author: Minigunmike

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm very surprised about how well these perform....especially for the price! I've had much more expensive tires on my ATVs in the past but these are just as good if not better than the others. I highly recommend these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It has lugs like a tractor!
customer_reviews.text: These tires should get me across the creek!! They are an oversize for my 366 Artic Cat. If they are oversize, you will need a machine to mount.
customer_reviews.author: damengineer

customer_reviews.title: ... rough on the road but off road they are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: kinda rough on the road but off road they are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect on our utv. Our tire were gone. I can get around in the mud and snow perfect. We used these in 1 1/2 ft of snow and still got to the top. Yeah!!
customer_reviews.author: idamouse

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend these tires
customer_reviews.text: They have Awesome grip and the rim protector bead is a major plus. I was surprised with the comfort of their ride
customer_reviews.author: Doug Cave

customer_reviews.title: It was for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: It met all his expectations. He was extremely happy with it! He received it quickly and in the time frame we were told to expect it. He would also buy these tires again. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Quad tire value
customer_reviews.text: Kenda tires met my expectations! The tires are smoother on road surfaces and handle well off road ! Truly a good quad choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marty

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best tires on a fourwheeler I've ever seen I completely love these tires I've been mudding even tho its cold here but it was so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Kenda K538 Executioner ATV Bias Tire - 25x8.00-12
feature_bullets: Designed to meet the demands of the muddiest 4x4 riding terrain
Tread design for deep down traction, even in the muddiest conditions
Reinforced knobs to reduce knob rollover at low pressure, improve ride comfort and increase tread life
Dimpled tread surface for improved traction on drier conditions
6-ply rated with extra tough casing resists punctures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
